classification_data.text: cotel integración avanzada EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S NIT .800.122.811-2 CERTIFICA QUE: De acuerdo con el Acta No. 063 de la Asamblea General Ordinaria de Accionistas de Cotel S.A.S de fecha marzo 29 de 2022, la nueva composición accionaria quedó registrada así: Accionista | Documento Identificación | No. de Acciones | % de Participación James Herney Quijano Morán | 16.758.096 | 5.740.000.000 | 82% María del Pilar Zuluaga Marín | 66.901.361 | 700.000.000 | 10% Nicolle Dayana Quijano Zuluaga | 1.107.089.788 | 210.000.000 | 3% Juan Pablo Quijano Zuluaga | 1.144.109.912 | 210.000.000 | 3% Cotel S.A.S | 800.122.811-2 | 140.000.000 | 2% Total | | 7.000.000.000 | 100% La nueva composición accionaria fue registrada en los libros contables, así mismo fue actualizado el libro de Registro de Accionistas. La presente certificación se expide en Santiago de Cali a los cinco (05) días del mes de febrero de 2024. Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar Revisor Fiscal TP No. 77391-T Miembro de Bloodhound Consulting Group SAS www.cotel.com.co

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step following the workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at the document, I can extract the following text: - Header shows "cotel integración avanzada" (company logo/branding) - Main title: "EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S NIT .800.122.811-2" - "CERTIFICA QUE:" - Content about "De acuerdo con el Acta No. 063 de la Asamblea General Ordinaria de Accionistas de Cotel S.A.S de fecha marzo 29 de 2022, la nueva composición accionaria quedó registrada así:" - A table with columns: "Accionista", "Documento Identificación", "No. de Acciones", "% de Participación" - Table rows showing shareholders with their identification numbers, number of shares, and ownership percentages: - James Herney Quijano Morán: 16.758.096, 5.740.000.000, 82% - María del Pilar Zuluaga Marín: 66.901.361, 700.000.000, 10% - Nicolle Dayana Quijano Zuluaga: 1.107.089.788, 210.000.000, 3% - Juan Pablo Quijano Zuluaga: 1.144.109.912, 210.000.000, 3% - Cotel S.A.S: 800.122.811-2, 140.000.000, 2% - Total: 7.000.000.000, 100% - Text about registration in accounting books - Date and location information - Signature of "Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar, Revisor Fiscal, TP No. 77391-T, Miembro de Bloodhound Consulting Group SAS" - Website: www.cotel.com.co I've identified a detailed shareholding certification document for Cotel S.A.S. The document reveals a concentrated ownership structure, with James Herney Quijano Morán holding the majority 82% stake. The company's shares are distributed among five entities, including family members and the company itself. The tax auditor, Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar from Bloodhound Consulting Group, has officially certified this shareholding composition based on the shareholders' assembly meeting from March 29, 2022. I identify this as an Accionista Composition Certificate (ACC) with clear ownership details. The document contains precise shareholder percentages, individual share quantities, and owner identification verified by a corporate authority. The certification includes numerical ownership breakdowns and personal identification, confirming its classification as a corporate shareholding structure document.
